<p align="center">
  The Vitaale theme for slack.
</p>

&nbsp;

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vitaale/vitaale/refs/heads/main/assets/misc/slack-preview.png" alt="vitaale slack preview"/>
</p>

&nbsp;

## Installation

1. Open Slack and click on your profile picture in the bottom left corner.
2. Go to `Preferences` → `Appearance`
3. Click `Custom theme` and then `Import`
4. Copy and paste the following into the text box:

```
#24202C,#E9897C,#B6377D,#75507B
```

5. Click `Apply`
6. Keep in mind to uncheck the `Window gradient` checkbox.
